nfl_teams_2026_draft.description: Complete NFL team data for 2026 draft, including team records, draft picks, needs analysis, roster strengths, and coaching context
nfl_teams_2026_draft.data_schema_note: Teams contain mix of basic draft picks (AFC West) and extended scouting context (other divisions)

season_context.playoff_result: Super Bowl LX vs Seattle Seahawks (TBD)
season_context.season_summary: Historic 10-game turnaround. Drake Maye's breakout rookie campaign. Went 8-0 on road (first time since 2016). First AFC East title since 2019. First playoff appearance since 2021. Vrabel's first season ends with Super Bowl.

teams.team_philosophy: Defensive-minded HC Mike Vrabel building complete team. Developing young franchise QB Drake Maye. Strong defense with veteran presence. Building through draft and smart free agency.

positional_needs.scheme_fit: Erhardt-Perkins - versatile receiver who can work all levels

positional_needs.scheme_fit: 3-4 - needs to play in space and rush from multiple positions
